data.expected_result: The save button should be there
data.short_description: Save button is gone when u want add roles to people manually in your server (Note: Stable 2.2.9 has it)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server where u have permissions to add roles to people manually  - Go to server settings - Head over to members - Try to add a role to yourself and realizes there’s no “save” button
